channel.title: Dividends on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Dividends on FinanClub

item.title: PPL
item.description: score:6 Chances: PPL’s fourth-quarter earnings are better than estimates and the company continues to make substantial investment to further strengthen its existing operations. Robust Capital Investment Plan and Dividend Growth Announced PPL’s estimated fair value is US$20.44 based on Dividend Discount Model Risks: PPL Corporation misses on earnings expectations.

item.title: DAL
item.description: score:-95 Chances: Delta Air Lines (DAL) closed at $40.60, marking a +1.2% move from the previous day. Delta’s DeliverDirect service offers ’e-commerce delivery at the speed of flight’, serving various industries including retail and pharmaceuticals. Delta has received attention from Zacks.com users lately, so it’s important to be aware of the factors that can impact the stock’s prospects.

item.title: ET
item.description: score:-5 Chances: Energy Transfer LP’s Q4 earnings have exceeded estimates, indicating strong performance and potential for future growth. The company’s expansion strategy is proving to be successful, leading to increased low-pressure volumes and potential for continued growth. ET shares have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term, as indicated by solid earnings estimate revisions.
